title: MEXICAN EGG AND BEAN TORTILLAS
directions: Turn on the grill to preheat. To make the salsa: combine the tomatoes, onion, garlic, chilli, one tablespoon of lime juice, and coriander in a bowl and mix. Season with the salt and pepper.
In another bowl, mix the black beans with the cumin and the remaining lime juice. Use a fork to lightly mash the beans. Add a small splash of warm water if it looks dry.
Crack eggs into a hot frying pan and cook them to your liking. Warm the tortillas briefly under the grill, or on a griddle pan if you have one.
Spread the beans on the tortillas and top with the eggs and salsa. Gather your amigos and eat, just donâ€™t spill any on your poncho.
